story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful land of Mali, there was a small village nestled between the rolling hills and the sparkling river. This village was home to many families, and they all lived in harmony with one another and with nature.

One of the families in the village had a young daughter named Amina. Amina was a curious and kind-hearted girl, with a smile that could light up the darkest room. She loved exploring the hills and playing by the river, and she always made sure to help her family and friends whenever they needed it.

One day, Amina heard a strange sound coming from the hills. She followed the sound until she came upon an old, wise tortoise who was struggling to climb a steep hill.

"Hello, wise one," Amina said with a friendly smile. "Why do you look so troubled?"

The tortoise looked up at Amina and replied, "I have been trying to reach the top of this hill for days, but I am too slow and the sun is setting. I need someone to help me carry my heavy shell to the top so I can see the beautiful view before the sun sets."

Amina's kind heart immediately went out to the tortoise, and she said, "Of course, I will help you! I may not be as wise as you, but I am strong and I will carry your shell to the top of the hill for you."

So, Amina picked up the tortoise's heavy shell and slowly but surely, she climbed to the top of the hill. When they reached the top, they were both out of breath, but the view was breathtaking. The sun was setting, painting the sky with hues of pink and orange and red.

The tortoise looked at Amina and said, "Thank you, young one, for your kindness and your strength. As a reward, I will grant you one wish. Anything your heart desires, I will make it come true."

Amina thought for a moment and then said, "I wish for the wisdom to always know what is truly important in life and to never forget to be kind to others."

The tortoise smiled and replied, "Your wish is granted, young one. May you always be blessed with kindness, wisdom, and the strength to follow your dreams."

And so, Amina returned to her village, wiser and more compassionate than ever before. And from that day on, she always remembered to be kind to others, no matter what.

The end.

Now, my dear daughter, it is time for you to close your eyes and drift off to sleep. May you always be blessed with kindness, wisdom, and the strength to follow your dreams, just like Amina. Sweet dreams!
